lines: ma lus rgyal ba'i lhan skyes ye shes ni
rnam kun mchog ldan dpa' bo'i gar mdzad pa
bla ma he ru ka dpal la btud nas
de yi sgrub thabs mkhas pa'i lugs bzhin bya
bstan pa bsrung dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad phyir
thugs dam bcas shing zhal gyis 'ches pa rnams
dpal chen bka' sdod yid ltar mgyogs pa yi
'jigs pa'i gzugs can drag gtum mi bzad pa
gdug pa 'dul mdzad nag po'i phyogs rnams 'joms
rnal 'byor las la 'bras bu ster mdzad cing
mthu stobs byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
gnod sbyin tshogs sogs brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo
sde brgyad btsun mo sras dang g.yog bcas pas
dngos grub kun gyi bka' drin bdag la stsol
rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas la
nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang
dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang
longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing
zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi
las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol
srung mas rtag tu grogs mdzod cig
dus mi 'chi dang nad rnams dang
gdon dang bgegs rnams zhi ba dang
rmi lam ngan dang bcas ma ngan
bya byed ngan pa med par mdzod
'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang
'bru sna rgyas shing chos 'phel dang
bde legs thams cad 'byung ba dang
yid la 'dod pa kun 'grub shog
sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la
rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi
theg pa gsum po thams cad dang
rnal 'byor gsang sngags mkha' 'gro ma
dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo
byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che
khyad par du yang slob dpon la
rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi
sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir
bdag ni he ru kar gyur nas
sems can thams cad he ru ka'i
go 'phang mchog la 'god par bgyi
bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa yis
dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams
bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig
gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste
thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can
'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi
gang gi drin gyi bde chen gnas
skad cig gis ni thob 'gyur ba
bla ma rin chen lta bu yi
rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud
he ru ka dpal dpa' bo che
rnam dag rdo rje'i dbang phyug dang
rjes chags chags pa che rnams kyi
rdo rje phag mo de la 'dud
dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
mkha' 'gro ma yis 'khor lo sgyur
ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid
'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo
ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing
'jig rten bya ba la 'jug ma
de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo
dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi
sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags
'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang
sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung
sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la
byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi
rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir
byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi
byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed bgyis nas
sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer
byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi
'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog
bgrod dka' srid pa'i rgya mtsho las
bdag gis 'gro rnams bsgral ba'i phyir
rang gi bdag nyid skad cig ma
sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bgyi
shar du mkha' 'gro ma nag mo
byang du lA ma ljang khu
nub tu khaN+Da ro hI dmar mo
lhor gzugs can ma ser mo
thams cad kyang zhal gcig ma
sgo mtshams ma brgyad kyis bgegs bskrad
dpa' bo rnams kyis shis pa brjod
dpa' mo rnams kyis rdo rje'i glu len
gtso bos dbang bskur ba'i dgongs pa mdzad
ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni
de bzhin gshegs pas khrus gsol ltar
lha yi chu ni dag pa yis
de bzhin bdag gis khrus bgyi'o
pham thing ba sku mched kyi X
klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyi X
mal gyo blo gros grags kyi X
sa chen kun dga' snying po'i X
slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo'i X
rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi X
chos rje sa skya paN+Di ta'i X
bo dong rin po che'i X
khro phu rin po che'i X
yang rtse ba rin cen seng ge'i X
oM DA ki ni hUM hUM phaT
oM lA me hUM hUM phaT
oM khaN+Da ro hI hUM hUM phaT
oM rU pi Ni hUM hUM phaT
bskal pa chen po'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od
ral ba'i cod paN mi bzad pa dang ldan
mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs pa'i zhal
stong phrag phyag ni 'bar ba'i 'od zer can
dgra sta zhags gdengs mdung dang kha TrAM 'dzin
stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa can
sku chen dud kha bgegs mthar mdzad la 'dud
'phags ma rig ma'i dbang phyug khams gsum gyis mi thub
'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rdo rje chen pos 'joms
rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs gzhan gyis mi thub dbang byed spyan
gtum mo khro mo'i gzugs kyis tshangs pa skem par mdzad
bdud rnams skrag cing skem byed gzhan gyi phyogs las rgyal
rmugs byed rengs byed rmongs byed kun las rnam par rgyal
rdo rje phag mo sbyor chen 'dod dbang ma la 'dud
de nas oM sum+b+ha sogs zhal bzhi pa'i sngags brjod de
srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan
'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan
rnam mang sku dang cha lugs rjes chags sems par ldan
he ru ka dpal de dang lhan cig gar byed shog
lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang
des brjod gsung yang mchog tu tshad ma ste
bden pa 'di dag gis ni lha mo rnams
bdag cag rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig
sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir
bdag ni he ru kar gyur nas
sems can thams cad he ru ka'i
go 'phang mchog la 'god par shog
ces bkra shis dang smon lam bya zhing
kha zas la 'jug pa na
kha zas kyi skyed chog dang
'bul tshul rgyas par 'grub na legs shing
dngos grub rin cen bye bas gang gyur pa'i
bde mchog sbas rgyud yid bzhin rgya mtsho nas
lha lnga'i sgrub thabs dbang gi rgyal po ni
skal bzang 'dod rgu'i dpal du bdag gis blangs
de yi dge bas tshe rabs thams cad du
bcom ldan yab yum gnyis kyis rjes bzung ste
brgya phrag dka' ba spyad la ma ltos par
sku gsum go 'phang myur du thob gyur cig
